nz.ac.waikato.mcennis.rat.graph.algorithm
Class AddMusicRecommendations

java.lang.Object
  nz.ac.waikato.mcennis.rat.graph.model.ModelShell
      nz.ac.waikato.mcennis.rat.graph.algorithm.AddMusicRecommendations
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Component, Algorithm, Model
public class AddMusicRecommendations
extends ModelShell
implements Algorithm

Creates derived user->artist links from knows, interest, and music links. NOTE: Adheres to direction in links - music from unequal links not made bidirectional FIXME: does not include code for including betweeness scores in calculations.

Author:
Daniel McEnnis
See Also:

calculateArtistWeight

public double calculateArtistWeight(Link knows,
                                    Link[] interest,
                                    Link[] music)
Helper function that calculates artist weights based on shared links

Parameters:
knows - link to actor whose recommendations are to be extracted
interest - set of all interest links from the person to recommend music for
music - set of all music links from the person to recommend music for.
Returns:
recommendation strength for any music this friend listens to

init

public void init(java.util.Properties map)
Parameters for initializing this algorithm
  1. 'name' - name of this isntance. Default is 'Basic Music Recommendation'.
  2. 'relation' - type (relation) of link to create. Default is 'Derived'.
  3. 'actorType' - type (mode) of actor to use. Default is 'User'.
  4. 'groundTruthType' - type (relation) of link representing given musical tastes. Default is 'Given'.
  5. 'sourceType1' - type (relation) of link representing degree of shared interests. Default is 'Interest'
  6. 'sourceType2' - type (relation) of link representing degree of shared music. Deafult is 'Music'.
  7. 'adjustorPropertyType' - name of property defining prestige or centrality for actors. Default is'Knows Betweeness'
  8. 'evaluation' - should the system supress 'Derived' links matching 'Given' links. Default is 'false'.
  9. 'sourceType1Weight' - weight of 'sourceType1' links. Deafult '1.0'.
  10. 'sourceType2Weight' - weight of 'sourceType2' links. Deafult '1.0'.


Input 1 - Link
Input 2 - Link
Input 3 - Link
Input 4 - Actor Property
Output 1 - Link

Specified by:
init in interface Component
Parameters:
map - map of the given properties naming parameters and their values in a string
